# Textfield
```import { Textfield } from "@elevenia/master-ui/Components/Atom";```

Textfield component based on `input` element. It commonly use in any pages.

<Preview>
<Story id="atom-textfield--default-model" />
</Preview>

<br />

## Stories
### Line Model

Line model is another variant or model of textfield component. To activate line model, add `model='line'` prop.

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-textfield--line-model" />
</Preview>

## Utils Props

There's no specific utility props for this component.

## Component Props
<Props of={Textfield} />


## Input related props (inputProps)
Every props that related to `input` element should be defined inside `inputProps` props.

### functional props

`onChange` prop is responsible to run function when any change happened to textfield.<br/>
`data-validation` prop is required if it necessary for certain functions.
<br />

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-textfield--default-model" />
</Preview>

### placeholder

`placeholder` prop works as same as placeholder attribute. It describes the expected value of an input field.
<br />

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-textfield--default-model" />
</Preview>

### readonly

when `readonly` prop has `true` value, the component will be in readonly state.
<br />

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-textfield--readonly" />
</Preview>



## Component related props

### status

`status` prop gives border or line color changes according to the value.
<br />

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-textfield--status" />
</Preview>

### disabled

when `disabled` prop has `true` value, the component will be disabled.
<br />

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-textfield--disabled" />
</Preview>

### Icon on Right and Icon on Left

`right` and `left` prop define what stuff will be placed on respective prop
<br />

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-textfield--with-icon-on-right" />
  <Story id="atom-textfield--with-icon-on-left" />
</Preview>
